ygData.subject: RE: SBLive crashes (OT) Sound Problems in general
ygData.msgSnippet: I even tried that to fix my sound problem at the suggestion of one of their techs.  I thought it was the silliest thing I ever heard of to tell me to turn that
ygData.messageBody:
I even tried that to fix my sound problem at the suggestion of one of their
techs. I thought it was the silliest thing I ever heard of to tell me to
turn that feature 'on' as a possible way to fix my sound problem, but I was
desperate enough to try voodoo or crystalmancy to get the darned thing
working at that point.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 01, 2000 2:05 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] SBLive crashes (OT) Sound Problems in general


From: jhenders@...

On Tue, Feb 01/00, "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...> wrote:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> thanks, no one at Verant ever indicated there was a message to even look
for
> and I've talked to at least 10 techies there. Do the rest of you A3d
users
> get the A3d screen whenever you load up at startup?
>

No, but I have it turned off in the A3D control panel. :)
